frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-switch-workspaces-on-active-monitor
frozen.shortDescription: Simulates switching the workspace on the active monitor only. Ctrl+Alt+q switches to the previous workspace, Ctrl+Alt+a switches to the next
frozen.longDescription: Simulates switching the workspace on the active monitor only. Ctrl+Alt+q switches to the previous workspace, Ctrl+Alt+a switches to the next
